review: Works well, except for the Slingplayer app. Even though I never lose connection to my Slingbox when using the Android or the Windows app, the Slingplayer app will drop connection after 10-15 min. Wireless signal connectivity is strong in the room in which the stick is, and I don't lose connection on Netflix, etc, so I've narrowed it down to the app.
author: Cooley Hurd

review: Wish you could cast things from your phone to the TV using the app, but overall we love it!  Love the remote control.

review: Exceeded my expectations! Love this fire stick. We play games and watch movies all the time with it. I also use it for music and my photos. Def worth having and def worth the measley 39 bucks it is.
